label: logicC:education_en
steps: [1] If the students attend the prerequisite workshop, then they understand the prerequisite concept.
[2] If they understand the prerequisite concept, then they can solve basic exercises on the topic.
[3] If they can solve basic exercises and the teacher assigns a practice set, then they pass the formative quiz.
[4] The teacher assigns a practice set.
[5] The students attend the prerequisite workshop.
[6] For every student x, if x completes all weekly assignments, then x understands the core material.
[8] For every student x, if x understands the core material, then x either scores highly on the final exam or produces a strong capstone project.
[10] They can solve basic exercises on the topic.
[12] Alex understands the core material and either scores highly on the final exam or produces a strong capstone project.
